I'm getting "SYSTEM_LICENSE_VIOLATION" with the key in the nfo and with the key that daand3 posted. Anyone have a working one?

IT WORKED!: After 3 days w/out sleeping I found a solution: It seems that you MUST specify the size of partition in Target Designer or the key won't work. In the middle panel, click in your TD name and go to Settings, look to the right panel and click "Target Device Settings", set your boot partition size, in my case 2048 MB, also check other informations, then use this serial (same provided with this torrent):

WR96Q-VJFK9-7QFH3-YJTBM-8R666

Just build and try to run. No more "SYSTEM_LICENSE_VIOLATION" =]

If Anyone is facing the Runtime License Error; Make sure you::
1) Specify the exact "Target Device Settings" in Target Designer
2) Upgrade to SP2 from the 3rd CD (the runtime license wont work if you just install SP1)
